sibling{left: "Pete", right: R}
----
text/plain
digraph G {
  "sibling{left: \"Pete\", right: R@\"Carolyn\"}" [label="Ref: sibling{left: \"Pete\", right: R@\"Carolyn\"}" shape="box"];
  "parents{child: L@\"Pete\", father: F@\"Paul\", mother: M@\"Mary\"}" [label="Ref: parents{child: L@\"Pete\", father: F@\"Paul\", mother: M@\"Mary\"}" shape="box"];
  "mother{child: C@\"Pete\", mother: M@\"Mary\"}" [shape="box"];
  "father{child: C@\"Pete\", father: F@\"Paul\"}" [shape="box"];
  "parents{child: R@\"Carolyn\", father: F@\"Paul\", mother: M@\"Mary\"}" [label="Ref: parents{child: R@\"Carolyn\", father: F@\"Paul\", mother: M@\"Mary\"}" shape="box"];
  "mother{child: C@\"Carolyn\", mother: M@\"Mary\"}" [shape="box"];
  "father{child: C@\"Carolyn\", father: F@\"Paul\"}" [shape="box"];
  "parents{child: L@\"Pete\", father: F@\"Paul\", mother: M@\"Mary\"}" -> "mother{child: C@\"Pete\", mother: M@\"Mary\"}" [label="ref"];
  "parents{child: L@\"Pete\", father: F@\"Paul\", mother: M@\"Mary\"}" -> "father{child: C@\"Pete\", father: F@\"Paul\"}" [label="ref"];
  "parents{child: R@\"Carolyn\", father: F@\"Paul\", mother: M@\"Mary\"}" -> "mother{child: C@\"Carolyn\", mother: M@\"Mary\"}" [label="ref"];
  "parents{child: R@\"Carolyn\", father: F@\"Paul\", mother: M@\"Mary\"}" -> "father{child: C@\"Carolyn\", father: F@\"Paul\"}" [label="ref"];
  "sibling{left: \"Pete\", right: R@\"Carolyn\"}" -> "parents{child: L@\"Pete\", father: F@\"Paul\", mother: M@\"Mary\"}" [label="ref"];
  "sibling{left: \"Pete\", right: R@\"Carolyn\"}" -> "parents{child: R@\"Carolyn\", father: F@\"Paul\", mother: M@\"Mary\"}" [label="ref"];
}
